sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"通知，告知"之意。
means: inform ： 普通用词，指传达事实或信息，或指经过研究或调查而获得的事实或信息。
acquaint ： 指提供有关信息或情况使某人熟悉某些过程或复杂的情况。
notify ： 指正式通知需要注意的事情。
advise ： 指正式通知某件重要事，所通知的事情与被通知的人有关。

sentence.Network_en: I don't suppose it occurred to you to notify the police.
sentence.Network_cn: 我看你没想过要去通知警察。

sentence.Network_en: The court clerk will notify the witness when and where to appear.
sentence.Network_cn: 法院办事员将通知证人出庭的时间及地点.

sentence.Network_en: He will notify us where we are to meet.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将通知我们在什么地方集合.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French notifier, from Latin notificare 'make known', from notus 'known' (see notion) + facere 'make'

entry.def: If you notify someone of something, you officially inform them about it.

example.ex: The skipper notified the coastguard of the tragedy...
example.tran: 船长向海岸警卫队报告了这起灾难。

example.ex: Earlier this year they were notified that their homes were to be cleared away...
example.tran: 今年早些时候他们接到通知说他们的房屋要拆迁。

sentences.sentence: "I advised him that the rent was due"

auth_sentence.content: Once an offer is accepted, notify your lender.
auth_sentence.res_content: Once an offer is accepted, notify your lender.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Once an offer is accepted, notify your lender.

auth_sentence.content: Current law requires only that a doctor notify a parent.
auth_sentence.res_content: Current law requires only that a doctor notify a parent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Current law requires only that a doctor notify a parent.

auth_sentence.content: It plans to notify affected customers in writing this week.
auth_sentence.res_content: It plans to notify affected customers in writing this week.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It plans to notify affected customers in writing this week.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 显而易见的, 值得注意的
stems_affixes.word_buile: notice注意到,注意+able……的→adj.显而易见的, 值得注意的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 臭名昭著的,声名狼藉的
stems_affixes.word_buile: not知道,注意,注释+orious多……的→多惹人注意的→臭名昭著的
notorious[[adj.臭名昭著的,声名狼藉的]]→n.臭名昭彰
denote[v.指示,表示,意味着]+ation表名词→n.指示

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得注意的,显著的,著名的
stems_affixes.word_buile: not知道,注意,注释+able能……的→n.值得注意的,显著的,著名的
not知道,注意,注释+e→n.笔记；注释 v.注意到
note笔记+book→n.笔记簿, 笔记本

stems_affixes.value_cn: 通知,通告,布告;注意,认识
stems_affixes.word_buile: not知道,注意,注释+ice表名词→n.通知,通告,布告;注意,认识 v.注意到,注意

stems_affixes.value_cn: 概念,想法,意念,看法,观点
stems_affixes.word_buile: not知道,注意,注释+ion表名词→n.概念,想法,意念,看法,观点
de加强+not知道,注意,注释+e→指示
not知道,注意,注释+e→n.笔记；注释 v.注意到
not知道,注意,注释+ify表动词→给以注意→通知
not知道,注意,注释+ice表名词→n.通知,通告,布告;注意,认识 v.注意到,注意

means.word_mean: 通知, 告知, 报告

sentences.en: When my guest arrives, please notify me.
sentences.cn: 我的客人到的时候, 请通知我。

sentences.en: Before organizing that procession along the street we ought to have notified the police.
sentences.cn: 在组织上街游行之前, 我们应该通报警察。

sentences.en: We'll notify the time of the meeting on the bulletin board.
sentences.cn: 我们将在布告栏上公布会议的时间。

sentences.en: The father notified his son's birth.
sentences.cn: 父亲公告了他儿子的出生。

sentences.en: We'll notify her to draw up a contract.
sentences.cn: 我们将通知她草拟一份合同。

sentences.en: I'll notify my lawyer to write out the agreement.
sentences.cn: 我将通知律师把契约写好。

sentences.en: I have got a letter notifying me to appear before the committee.
sentences.cn: 我接到一封信, 通知我到委员会去。

sentences.en: He didn't notify me how to get in touch with him.
sentences.cn: 他没有告诉我怎样跟他联系。

sentences.en: The court clerk will notify the witness when and where to appear.
sentences.cn: 法院办事员将通知证人出庭的时间及地点。

sentences.en: We'll notify you where to get it.
sentences.cn: 我们会通知你在什么地方取。

sentences.en: I am glad to notify you that your mother has arrived.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴告诉你, 你母亲到了。

sentences.en: Our teacher notified us that there would be a test on Monday.
sentences.cn: 我们老师通知我们星期一要考试。

sentences.en: They notified the authorities that pollution in that area was serious.
sentences.cn: 他们报告当局那个地区的污染严重。

sentences.en: I notified the post office that my address had changed.
sentences.cn: 我把变更的地址通知了邮局。

sentences.en: I was abruptly notified that a half-hour speech was expected of me.
sentences.cn: 我突然被通知要讲半个小时的话。

sentences.en: Please notify us when you arrive, so that we'll be ready.
sentences.cn: 请通知我们你们什么时候到达, 以便我们做准备。

sentences.en: He will notify us where we are to meet.
sentences.cn: 他将通知我们在什么地方集合。

jushi.english: When my guest arrives, please notify me.
jushi.chinese: 我的客人到的时候,请通知我。

jushi.english: Before organizing that procession along the street we ought to have notified the police.
jushi.chinese: 在组织上街游行之前,我们应该通报警察。

jushi.english: The father notified his son's birth.
jushi.chinese: 父亲公告了他儿子的出生。
